Functions

FX_EXPORT BOOL fx_init (void)
 if you want to use the libfetion, you must invoke this functions at first.
FX_EXPORT void fx_terminate (void)
 shutdown the libfetion, when libfetion isn't used any more.
FX_EXPORT BOOL fx_close_network ()
 shutdown the connect to fetion's servers.

Function Documentation

BOOL fx_close_network (  ) 

shutdown the connect to fetion's servers.

this function will close the fetion's socket from fetion's servers, if you will not use fetion anymore

Returns:
TRUE if init successfully, otherwise return FALSE.

BOOL fx_init ( void   ) 

if you want to use the libfetion, you must invoke this functions at first.

This function will init some resources which the libfetion needed.

Returns:
TRUE if init successfully, otherwise return FALSE.
See also:
fx_shutdown

void fx_terminate ( void   ) 

shutdown the libfetion, when libfetion isn't used any more.

This function will release the resources which the libfetion used.

See also:
fx_init
